revised_title: Quantitative Electron-Microscopical Study of Postnatal Development of Lateral Geniculate Nucleus in Kittens
tldr: The study investigates the postnatal development of the lateral geniculate nucleus in normal kittens and those with eyelid suture using electron microscopy. The results show that eyelid closure does not significantly affect the development of the lateral geniculate nucleus, and the synaptic organization of the nucleus matures during the period of susceptibility to eyelid closure.
